description: This course deals with the formulation and execution of Data Monetization strategies. This relatively new organizational competence needs the integration of complementary views on data from four different domains, namely, Business, Legal, Operations and Technology. The interplay also cuts across different capabilities involving leadership, organizational culture, process digitisation, legal and regulatory, analytics and information technology. Experience around the world demonstrates that a holistic approach is essential to deliver Data Monetization successfully. The content in the course will focus on strategies and actual market opportunities in different industries, covering a variety of Lines-of-Business and expanding practical value-creation in ecosystems.
title: Data Monetisation
